alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Scotts Bluff and southeastern Sioux Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 202 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Alice, or 8 miles northeast of Scottsbluff, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Minatare, Lake Minatare Campground and Lake Alice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
